DOC.brief_summary: Background : A novel milk peptide show laboratory set natural anti-cancer property extend lifespan improve metabolism animal model . The purpose study 1 . ) determine safety dosage range , 2 . ) determine whether novel milk peptide positively influence blood marker , metabolism improve quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Safety Novel Milk Protein Peptide
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial university research set . Healthy volunteer randomly assign ingest double-blind randomized manner either placebo milk peptide . Outcome measure assess 0 , 3 , 6 week supplementation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject body mass index 2740. metabolic disorder include know electrolyte abnormality , heart disease , arrhythmia , diabetes , thyroid disease hypogonadism ; history hypertension , hepatorenal , musculoskeletal , autoimmune , neurologic disease ; take thyroid , hyperlipidemic , hypoglycemic , antihypertensive , androgenic medication ; milk allergy
